Title: The I of the Storm
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Dave Andron, Elmore Leonard (based on the short story "Fire in the Hole" by), Benjamin Cavell (story editor)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts
Plot: Dewey Crowe returns and tries to score on a drug shipment, but the bus carrying the drugs is hijacked, and he tries to impersonate Raylan Givens to get it back. Meanwhile Boyd gets a proposition from some fellow coal miners.
